data.descripcion: Hola, Soy Gastón Blanco, un apasionado por descubrir el mundo, y aprender tanto como pueda de él. Soy Diseñador Industrial y me especialicé en diseño y modelado 3D.
data.descripcion2: Hoy me encuentro capacitándome en programación web, enfocado en el área del Front-End. Aspiro a convertirme en un Unicornio.

data.descripcion: Opte por aprovechar la pandemia para mejorar mi carrera laboral. Me encontraba enfocado en trabajos de Diseño Industrial y servicios de modelado 3D. Por lo cual comencé un emprendimiento de impresión 3D.
data.descripcion2: Como esto me dio la posibilidad manejar mis tiempos, decidí que era tiempo de mejorar mi nivel profesional, todo se dio en el momento ideal, en ese momento inicio el curso de Argentina Programa.

Siempre participar como arquero en los juegos mmrpg
, y cuando me mude a Bs
 As me topé con un club de arquería.
data.descripcion2: Así que como persona curiosa tenía que intentarlo. Resulto ser una actividad muy entretenida y gratificante al acertar al blanco. Le recomiendo a todo el que le interese que lo intente.

data.pp: I created this website while working for TDIL. The website is developed in Drupal and uses StoryBook. My responsibility was web layout and building the StoryBook, taking charge of that area.
data.title: Bnutrition

data.pp: Messaging service for lawyers, notifying each case resolution in progress. Enhances legal communication and efficiency.
data.title: Secretario Virtual

data.pp: This 3D printable design was created for a grow shop, with the main requirements being the support for both fan sizes sold in the store and adaptability to their two grow tent models.
data.title: Fan support

data.pp: Design of a cup inspired by the character Pochita from the anime Chainsaw Man. An original prototype was created for molding and subsequent ceramic production.
data.title: ChainsawMan Cup

data.pp: Concept art of the character from the light novel No Game No Life. The design is based on the drawings by the artist Yū Kamiya, the creator of the novel.
data.title: Holou

data.pp: A customer-focused 3D design and printing service that emerged during the pandemic. The website was wireframed using Figma, ensuring a personalized experience.
data.title: 2+1Disegno

data.descripcion: Gaston Blanco, I'm an industrial designer, and I'm training to become a web programmer.

Thanks to my curiosity and eagerness to continuously learn and master new technologies, I strive to tackle increasingly complex and challenging projects. If you're interested in learning more about a specific tool, you can find further information in each entry.

I'm always engaged in constant learning, whether it's in an academic or professional setting. In this section, I'd like to share some of the courses I have taken. Most of them are aligned with my two passions: design and programming.

My work experiences have been diverse. Here, you can find the most relevant ones, along with the most interesting projects I have completed thus far. If you'd like to explore more 3D models, I invite you to visit my Behance profile.
Se creativo, cuanto mas interesante sea antes te van a contactar
Espero este tu pueste soñado

Welcome to my profile! Here, you can discover more about me as an individual, the programs and frameworks I feel most comfortable working with, and information that I believe might pique your interest.
We create incredible projects
Colors have been changed to make it suitable for printing.
It's used to build single-page web applications and provides a structured approach to development using components, services, and other concepts.
It's a markup language used to create the structure and content of web pages. It consists of tags that define the function and appearance of the content.
It allows you to control the appearance of HTML elements, such as colors, fonts, margins, and sizes, to enhance the visual aspect and presentation of web pages.
It's an extension of CSS. It simplifies writing and maintaining CSS code by enabling a more modular and reusable approach to styling.
It's mainly used to add interactivity to web pages, like animations, form validations, effects, and dynamic elements.
It's open-source software for creating and animating 3D graphics, modeling, texturing, rendering, and video editing.
It's a 3D digital sculpting and modeling program. Its powerful sculpting engine allows artists to sculpt intricate details directly on 3D models.
React builds single-page web apps with a structured approach using components, state management, and reusable UI elements.

data.pp: It is a training program in languages and programming knowledge, testing, and digital skills to enhance employability in the software and technology sector.
data.title: Argentina Programa 4.0

data.pp: As a professional trained at ORT Arg. I have the skills to analyze, design, and manage products and their commercialization. I generate innovation and optimization in processes.
data.title: Industrial Design

data.pp: 50% of internet traffic comes from mobile devices, making it a priority to develop frontends for smartphones, tablets, and laptops. The course focuses on creating adaptive/responsive projects.
data.title: Responsive Design

data.pp: Course on all functions to manipulate arrays professionally, understanding when the array is mutated or cloned, with examples of use.
data.title: Manipulación de Arrays

data.pp: Course where I learned about lists, trees, and graphs, as well as their differences, to create more efficient code.
data.title: Estructuras de Datos JS

data.pp: Course to facilitate the tasks of designers and developers in the software creation process. Learn strategies to present design systems and use them as discussion tools to facilitate decision-making among teams.
data.title: Design system

data.pp: Course on HTML tags, semantics, CSS, how to style elements of your website, EM/REM units, box model, and much more.
data.title: HTML y CSS

data.pp: Course of Figma to learn how to create different texts and styles, vector networks, various levels of prototyping, adding comments to designs, managing version history in Figma, and much more.
data.title: Prototyping and Interfaces.

data.pp:
Curso de React.
Patrones de Rénder y Composición.\n Manejo del Estado.
data.title: React Avanzado

data.pp: Las URL nos permiten acceder a las diferentes vistas que tiene una web, además de organizar mejor nuestro sitio. En este curso practiqué el uso de React Router
data.title: React Router

data.pp: Curso sobre los conceptos clave de las máquinas de estado aprendiendo cuándo usarlas y cuáles son sus beneficios. Comprende qué es XState y cuáles son sus funcionalidades para mejorar mi flujos de trabajo.
data.title: React Machines

data.pp: En este curso aprendi a Crea estados independientes o compuestos, imperativos o declarativos, con funciones o clases, con useState o useReducer  e identificar las mejores herramientas para cada caso de uso
data.title: React State

data.pp: Aprendi como comparte información entre componentes con render props, high order components y React Hooks. Ademas los  principios de diseño, composición de componentes y colocación del estado en React.js para escalar mis aplicación web
data.title: React Render and Composition

data.pp: Aprendi sobre las principales solicitudes HTTP basic en Angular. Tambien aprendi sobre las buenas prácticas para el manejo de ambientes y errores, ademas de como Implementa la autenticación de users
data.title: Angular ApiRest

data.pp: Curso para conoce más sobre la arquitectura de este framework. Conecta las aplicaciones con una API para obtener datos de un sistema de Backend
data.title: Angular Component and Services

data.pp: refers to the practice of designing and developing websites and web applications to be inclusive and accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.
data.title: Web Accessibility

data.pp: Aprendí a  configura tus secuencias de animaciones y micro-interacciones con las propiedades animation y keyframes. Explora las buenas prácticas de implementar (o no) animaciones en tus aplicaciones.
data.title: Animation CSS

data.pp: En este curso comprendí qué son y cómo funcionan los entornos virtuales y los virtual hosts. Empieza a usar constantes, variables, variables superglobales y funciones variables.
data.title: PHP Entornos virtuales

data.pp: Aprendí sobre las cookies, sesiones, manejo de excepciones, funciones para fechas y modularización en tu código.
data.title: PHP Cookies and Sesiones

data.pp: Comprendí como conectar un backend en PHP con bases de datos relacionales. Además de las diferencias entre MySQLi y PDO para ejecutar sentencias SQL y evitar problemas de seguridad como SQL Injection
data.title: PHP Database

data.pp: Aprendí sobre los conceptos fundamentales de diseño para páginas web y estudie los casos de uso, diferencias y similitudes entre Flexbox y CSS Grid
data.title: CSS Grid y Flexbox

data.pp: Aprendí a comprender la arquitectura de componentes, design tokens, pruebas y plugins para asegurar la calidad del proyecto y atransforma un design system en Figma a código CSS y JavaScript
data.title: StoryBook

data.pp: Amazing digital experiences start with in-depth research and a clear interaction flow. I learned to design attractive and functional interfaces for users.
data.title: Interface Design
